summary: Adds two spells - Bind and Gate - which provide a more immersive fast travel system.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds two spells called Bind and Gate which work together to create an immersive and balanced fast-travel system. There are also three new perks in the Conjuration tree to improve the features of the spells.

You can find a copy of [i]Gate[/i] under Farengar's bed in Dragonsreach. The default bind location for the first bind point is in the Arcaneum at the College of Winterhold, so casting [i]Gate[/i] will take you there, where you'll find [i]Bind[/i] on the librarian's desk.

---

Changelog:
[list][*][size=2]v0.3 - cleaned mod with TES5Edit[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]v0.2 - fixed missing scripts (oops)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]v0.1 - Initial release[/size][/*]
[/list]
Teleport spells have long been a part of the Elder Scrolls series, but were eschewed in Skyrim in favor of a rather less interesting - if more convenient - fast travel system. This mod adds them back in, and should help cut out some of the tedium for people like me who prefer not to use the fast travel mechanic.

Note: Being able to fast-travel at any time is a great power, and with it comes a great responsibility. [b]Before teleporting, ask yourself if you might mess up a quest by doing so. Skyrim was not designed for this mechanic.[/b]

Benefits:
[list][*][size=2]Improves immersion by integrating fast travel into the game mechanics.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][b]Allows fast-travel without time passing[/b], helpful for users of mods like [i]Realistic Needs and Diseases[/i].[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][b]No carry weight restrictions[/b]. No need to mount a horse to lug your loot back to a vendor.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Can fast-travel from [b]interior spaces[/b].[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Balanced: Cannot Bind or Gate in combat, plus Gate drains Stamina, Health, and Magicka to 1 each. ([i]Unfettered [/i]perk removes these limitations)[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
Perks:[/size]
[list][*][size=2][b]Translocation (1/2) - [/b][i]Requires Novice Conjuration, Conjuration 20 - [/i]Can Bind and Gate to three different locations.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][b]Translocation (2/2) - [/b][i]Requires Translocation 1, Conjuration 40 - [/i]Can Bind and Gate to five different locations.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][b]Unfettered - [/b][i]Requires Translocation 1, Conjuration 60 - [/i]Can Bind and Gate in combat, without teleport sickness.[/size][/*]
[/list]
IMFT is known to be compatible with:
[list][*][size=2]SkyRe[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
IMFT is known not to be compatible with:
[/size][list][*][size=2]nothing, so far[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
IMFT has not been tested with:[/size][list][*][size=2]Requiem[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
[i]Have a favorite mod whose compatibility you're concerned about, or an update to this data? Leave a message!
[/i][/size]
In general, this mod makes few edits and should work with most other mods, although it may fight with other mods that make changes to the Conjuration perk tree. I will try to develop compatibility patches if needed.
author: rainbowhyphen
